_header: Right best beloved and most in assurance
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; lovers, faithful; women, as speakers/narrators
_description: The Faithful Mistress — nine stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawC813.First Lines:
Right best beloved and most In assuranceof my trewe harte I me
                    recommende…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…vnto the presence off venus that goddas eternallwhoo off hur
                    goodnes grante Ioye to trewe louers all
